featured.text: Only a few centimeters in length, the fish breed easily in captivity, grow quickly, and their transparent body makes it easy to study their organs.

F. Frank Well, if zoos are an inevitability, zoo keepers must provide the best possible conditions for the animals that live in captivity—to say the least! G. George Zoos have an educational aspect to it.

definition.zh_def: 囚禁；被囚禁的狀態或情況。
definition.en_def: The state of being kept in a confined space or being held against one's will.
definition.example: The animals in the zoo live in captivity.
